You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Zfr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2128/index.htm U+02128].
  * `&zfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D537.
